# Summarizer


```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

cache <- drake::new_cache('/media/ICEAGE/drake-cache/')

library(data.table)
library(patchwork)

kable <- function(data) {
  knitr::kable(data, booktabs = TRUE, format = 'html') %>% 
    kableExtra::kable_styling(full_width = FALSE,
    													position = 'left')
}
```
